name: OCKStylable
desc: An object that to which you can apply style.

items.name: var customStyle: OCKStyler?
items.desc: A property to access that overrides style.

items.name: func style() -> OCKStyler
items.desc: Returns an object's custom style, the first parent with a custom style, or the default style.

items.name: func styleChildren()
items.desc: Notifies the child views of style changes.
